projects.title: Ticket Management System
projects.summary: Issue tracking and support request management platform.
projects.details: A web based system to manage support tickets, assign tasks and track resolution progress. Built for teams to organize client requests and internal workflow efficiently.

projects.title: EcomStack
projects.summary: Modern e-commerce platform with admin control panel including POS.
projects.details: Full stack e-commerce solution including product management, cart system, order handling and admin dashboard. Designed for scalable online business operations.

projects.title: Restaurant Management System
projects.summary: Ordering, billing and operational management software.
projects.details: Handles menu control, orders, billing and daily records through a centralized dashboard to simplify restaurant workflow.
